=== Presentations ===
Presentations can be held for free at Odom's Bar in Century, Florida.  Odom's Bar invites all comers to take advantage of the 100" big screen and HD Projector to do your presentation on Ubuntu.  You can use the house PA System (3000 watts) to make sure everybody can hear you.  The house videographer will make sure that your entire presentation is captured, preserved forever, and shared across that Internet.

There are several Impress Templates I have just uploaded. DifundeUbuntu Nicaragua (http://www.ubuntu.org.ni/difunde) was the creator and I have also uploaded a zipped up file with the source files, and the CC licensing associated with them.
